text: John Banner, known for playing Sergeant “I know nothing! Schultz in “Hogan’s Heroes,” was an Austrian Jew who came to the U.S. in 1938 as a refugee. His whole family died in concentration camps. He learned English, worked in show biz, enlisted in the U.S. Army Air Corps in 1942.

There's a meme going around on Facebook that claims there is a retired Army Sergeant on trial for murdering two Syrian refugees who raped his daughter. It's a hoax, probably created by a Russian or by a U.S. alt-right to make Americans fear their neighbor.

Read this story about Master Sergeant Do Nguyen, one of the Medical Recruiting Brigades very own! This story highlights his journey, from a Vietnamese refugee to enlisting into the U.S. Army. @ USARECPAOhttps://www.army.mil/article/205620/army_first_sergeants_long_road_to_freedom …

It also features an Anglican Minister and her undocumented Vietnamese girlfriend standing up to a hypocritical Church hierarchy, a Lebanese woman whose parents were killed by the IDF but who is also rich & a drug addict, a predatorial army sergeant & two Iraqi refugees

# VHMlistens to Alphonso Beverly. As a Sergeant Major in the US Army Quartermaster Corps, he transported refugees from liberated concentration camps outside Munich and Nuremberg. http://ow.ly/tZCg30iaIfz
My grandfather was a Syrian refugee as well. Served in Army Aircorp WWII as master sergeant. Risked his life for his new country.
This guy. My brother. Now Sergeant Major of the United States Army! Not bad for a former refugee # Army # Airborne # Ranger # realhero # Iowanpic.twitter.com/WwZOvB6hDU
A photo of my father Staff Sergeant Lamm, a German refugee, in his US Army uniform when in service in England during WW II.
A NYS trooper & Army Reserve sergeant major with 3 combat tours is going back to Iraq to help refugees. Plz help him https://www.gofundme.com/22484us
My friend & Army Infantry Staff Sergeant welcomes refugees to the U.S. and personally wants to travel across seas to battle extremists.
N.C. reaches $2.5 million settlement with estate of former Army sergeant, a mentally ill inmate who died of thirst http://www.charlotteobserver.com/news/local/crime/article27963238.html …
